headline: Pre-Tariff Pharma Stockpiling Gives Irish Economy a Huge Booster Shot
summary: Ireland’s economy grew three times as rapidly as first estimated in the first quarter. That was driven by stockpiling of pharmaceuticals and other goods by U.S. businesses ahead of threatened tariffs.

raw.headline: Pre-Tariff Pharma Stockpiling Gives Irish Economy a Huge Booster Shot
raw.summary: Ireland’s economy grew three times as rapidly as first estimated in the first quarter. That was driven by stockpiling of pharmaceuticals and other goods by U.S. businesses ahead of threatened tariffs.

headline: Eli Lilly: If You Don't Buy On Weight Loss Promise Now, You Probably Never Will
summary: Eli Lilly and Company thrives on its groundbreaking weight-loss drug tirzepatide. Learn why we could see a $50B market and the risks. Click for my LLY stock update.

headline: REGN Strengthens Obesity Pipeline: Will the Move Revive the Stock?
summary: REGN inks a $2B-plus obesity drug deal with Hansoh, aiming to expand its pipeline amid slumping Eylea sales and pipeline setbacks.

headline: Should You Invest $1,000 in Eli Lilly today?
summary: Eli Lilly is a pharma player, but it offers the growth of a tech stock thanks to its weight loss drugs portfolio.  The weight loss market could represent a multibillion-dollar opportunity well into the next decade.  Eli Lilly (NYSE: LLY) sells a broad range of medicines, from cancer and immunology drugs to treatments for migraine.
